Articles.Content: What would game do if I would have build in orbit (by docking long girder segments) spacecraft longer than render distance?

All parts beyond the render distance would be on rails, and you'd likely crash KSP

You are talking about 2.5km here, good luck trying to build that!
Someone did this with several things and KAS. I don't remember *exactly* what happened, but it summoned the kraken, then crashed the game.
Damn, I will have to try, it cannot be that hard, I think I can build cca 100m long girder segments with bit of RCS and docking ports on each end and bolt it together in orbit.

What's going to inevitably happen is that any parts outside render distance (Which I have found is about 2.2km) are put on rails, meaning anything that you put in between is going to accelerate while the rest of the craft does not, This will result in rapid unplanned disassembly.
